briefTitle: D Mannose in Recurrent Urinary Tract Infections

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients 18 years old or older
* 3 or more culture documented urinary tract infections in the preceding 12 months
* Patients who had not taken antimicrobials within 4 weeks and were not pregnant or contemplating pregnancy.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with evidence of upper urinary tract infection, such as temperature higher than 38 Â°C, flank/lumbar pain or tenderness.

outcomeMeasures.title: Days
outcomeMeasures.description: time required to develop the next urinary tract infection; evaluation by means of urine analysis and urine culture
